divs: sighting detailswhite ball of light w\yellow and black smoke. i was on my way to meet a fellow associate from work. sitting at a parking lot of a restaurant doing some paper work while sitting in my van. i glanced up and was looking at the sky . i saw an object traveling at a 45 degree angle. going from right to left, i thought it was a meteor, or a plane, i, don't know what to think.it was falling on the north central horizon,the object was far away but large. a plane far away does not look large. this object was glowing white like the arc of a welder. like a star w\trails of yellow and black.during this sighting i glanced at my watch and it was exactly 06:45 a.m. the object was coming down fast and disappeard from my sight. i have been watching the news to see if anyone saw the same thing.
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
